mapper.select: SELECT TREVCID AS commentId, TREVID AS postId, TOPPARENTID AS topParentId, PARENTID AS parentId, PARENTNICKNAME AS parentNickname, MEMID AS memId, MEMNICK AS memnick, COMMENTSTATUS AS status, TREVCTEXT AS content, TREVDEPTH AS depth, TREVCREGDATE AS regdate, TREVDUPDATE AS updates FROM TREVIEWCOMMENT WHERE TREVID = #{trevid} AND COMMENTSTATUS IN ('CMT001', 'CMT003') START WITH TREVCID = TOPPARENTID CONNECT BY PRIOR TREVCID = PARENTID ORDER SIBLINGS BY TREVCREGDATE ASC

SELECT TREVCID AS commentId, TREVID AS postId, TOPPARENTID AS topParentId, PARENTID AS parentId, MEMID AS memId, MEMNICK AS memnick, COMMENTSTATUS AS status, TREVCTEXT AS content, TREVDEPTH AS depth, TREVCREGDATE AS regdate, TREVDUPDATE AS updates FROM TREVIEWCOMMENT WHERE TREVCID = #{commentId}
mapper.insert:
SELECT SEQ_TREVCID.NEXTVAL FROM dual
INSERT INTO TREVIEWCOMMENT ( TREVCID, TREVID, TOPPARENTID, PARENTID, PARENTNICKNAME, MEMID, MEMNICK, TREVCTEXT, TREVDEPTH, TREVCREGDATE ) VALUES ( #{commentId}, #{postId}, #{topParentId}, #{parentId}, #{parentNickname}, #{memId}, #{memnick}, #{content}, #{depth}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP )
mapper.update: UPDATE TREVIEWCOMMENT SET COMMENTSTATUS = 'CMT002', TREVDUPDATE = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE TREVCID IN ( SELECT TREVCID FROM ( SELECT TREVCID FROM TREVIEWCOMMENT START WITH TREVCID = #{commentId} CONNECT BY PRIOR TREVCID = PARENTID ) )
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REPORT( REPORTID, REPORTERID, REPORTEDTREVCID, REPORTEDCONTENTTYPE, REPORTREASON, REPORTDATE, REPORTSTATUS ) VALUES( SEQ_REPORTID.NEXTVAL, #{reporterId}, #{reportedTrevcId}, #{reportedContentType}, #{reportReason}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{reportStatus} )
